des:
From single-family homes to commercial buildings, we offer smart, safe, sustainable hardware solutions that save energy, time, and money and let you have a full-control-experience of your place’s items. With Smartev skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart lighting switches, smart plugs, etc. by voice. To get started, select the ‘Enable Skill’ button in the Alexa App to link your Smartev account and discover your device(s). To use the skill, you'll need to specify by name which device, plug or home to use. You can refer to them in two ways:

* Individually, by the name that you've already set up on your Smartev device.
* By group (such as Kitchen or Downstairs), which you can set up using Alexa. Instructions and more information can be found at http://amzn.to/2965dCE.

To control your light switch, simply say the following:
"Alexa, turn on Kitchen lights."
"Alexa, turn off Kitchen lights."

To control your smart plug, simply say the following:
"Alexa, turn on clothes iron."
"Alexa, turn off clothes iron."
